scripts.prisma:push:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/prisma-push.ts
scripts.prisma:push:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/prisma-push.ts
scripts.db:up:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/db-up.ts
scripts.db:down:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/db-down.ts
scripts.db:up:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/db-up.ts
scripts.db:down:test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test ts-node -r tsconfig-paths/register -P tsconfig.scripts.json scripts/db-down.ts
scripts.test:e2e:dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm-run-all -s db:up:test prisma:push:test prisma:generate test:e2e:run db:down:test
